Posts.Content: Hi everyone... I am fairly new to all this... Well about a year and a half ago i had a son, six months later i noticed a small lump on my left areola...went to the doctors and told me not to worry about it and that it wasnt any serious...i still have the lump and i guess that the good thing is that it hasnt grown...but lately for the past 2 months, when i have my period my left underarm tends to get swollen and it hurts. I felt for lumps and dont feel any..Im very worried cause i dont wanna think i have breast cancer! Im 23 years old and am very very scared! Please help!!!
Posts.Title: lump on left areola and swollen armpit

Posts.Content: Hi everyone.... Well im 23 years old and had a baby about a year ago...I breastfed for 3 months ...after i stopped breastfeeding, 3 months later i noticed a small lump on my left breast on my areola...i went to the doctor a couple months after to have a breast exam and the doctor told me that she thinks its nothing serious...i still have the lump and the only change i have had its that it looks like a tiny bruise! Im so scared and dont know what to do! please someone help me
Posts.Title: lump on left areola! Im very scared and worried!
